subject: Baseball
History
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lockman, the New York Giants’ outfielder-first baseman, set the stage for Bobby Thomson’s pennant-winning home run with a double hit against the Brooklyn Dodgers in 1951.
snippet: Mr. Lockman, the New York Giants’ outfielder-first baseman, set the stage for Bobby Thomson’s pennant-winning home run with a double hit against the Brooklyn Dodgers in 1951.
